page.title: 17RADIO AND T.V. SURVEY
page.content: 43.7% of interviewees watch breakfast TV.Of those veiwing,70.2% watch Good Morning Britain(TV AM),29.8% Breakfast TV (BBC).46.1% OF breakfast TV viewers are under 18 years old.51.0% of all under 18s interviewed watch breakfast TV,81.2% of them TV AM. 67.8% Said Central (ITV) was their most used channel,28.8% BBC 1,1.7% BBC 2 1.7% Channel 4.Least used,Channel 4 at 54.8%,BBC 2 at 40.0%.Only one interviewee had no radio.87.4% had at least one stero radio. Average time spent listening each week was 9.9 hours.Most used radio station was Radio 1 at 64.8%,Radio 2 at 7.4%, Radio 3 at 4.6% Radio 4 at 5.6%,BBC Local Radio at 14.8% and Commercial Radio at 2.8%.Of those with radios 52.5% use only three sations or less.22.0% use only one station.
